name: Mario Superstar
overview: "A hack created with the help of one TLMB (I did the coding, he did the level design and graphics) for a contest, which it won first place in. In this game, Mario can't jump on enemies as he usually can. Instead, Mario is equipped with a net with which he can capture enemies. When Mario captures an enemy, he takes something from them which he uses to destroy his enemies, a "power" if you would. This is just a single level, but it was a lot of fun to make."
